description: Watch Hope for Haiti Now LIVE on your Palm Pre or Pixi @ 8:00 ET/PT (powered by Mediafly + Obtiva)  "Hope for Haiti Now: A Global Benefit for Earthquake Relief," will feature more than one hundred of the biggest names in film, television, and music supporting the cause with testimonials and by answering phones during the telethon. The two-hour telethon will air on Friday, January 22, 2010 at 8:00 p.m. ET/PT and 7:00 p.m. CT across several US and Canadian networks and broadcasters.”
